member.name: T:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile
member.summary: Represents one complete collection of midi events from a file - standard midi or yamaha style files. Writes subsets to various output formats.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile._includeNoisy
member.summary: Include events like controller changes, pitch wheel, ...

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile._patterns
member.summary: All the file pattern sections. Plain midi files will have only one, unnamed.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.TimeSignature
member.summary: Time signature, if supplied by file. Default is 4/4.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.Read(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.param: Specified by client in case not in the file.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.GetPattern(System.String)
member.returns: The pattern. Throws if name not found.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.GetPatternNames
member.summary: Get all useful pattern names - those with musical notes.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.GetGlobal
member.summary: Get common midi file meta info.

member.summary: Read the CASM section of a style file.

member.summary: Read the CSEG section of a style file.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.ReadSdec(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Read the Sdec section of a style file.

member.summary: Read the Ctab section of a style file.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.ReadCntt(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Read the Cntt section of a style file.

member.summary: Read the OTSc section of a style file.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.ReadFNRc(System.IO.BinaryReader)
member.summary: Read the FNRc section of a style file.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.CleanUpPatterns
member.summary: Fill in any missing pattern info using defaults.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiDataFile.ReadStream(System.IO.BinaryReader,System.Int32)
member.summary: Read a number from stream and adjust endianess.

member.name: T:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiEventDesc
member.summary: Internal representation of one midi event.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiEventDesc.ScaledTime
member.summary: Time (subs) scaled to internal units using send PPQ.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiExport.ExportCsv(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo},System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Ephemera.MidiLib.OutputChannel},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Int32})
member.summary: Export the contents in a csv readable form. This is as the events appear in the original file.
member.param: Specific channnels or all if empty.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiExport.ExportMidi(System.String,Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{Ephemera.MidiLib.OutputChannel},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Int32})
member.summary: Export pattern parts to individual midi files. This is as the events appear in the original file.
member.param: Specific channnels or all if empty.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiSettings.LibSettings
member.summary: Current midi settings. Client must set this before accessing!

member.name: T:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiTimeConverter
member.summary: Helpers to translate between midi standard and arbtrary internal representation.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiTimeConverter._midiPpq
member.summary: Resolution for midi file events aka DeltaTicksPerQuarterNote.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiTimeConverter.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Double)
member.param: BPM may be needed for some calcs.

member.name: T:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo
member.summary: Represents the contents of a midi file pattern. If it is a plain midi file (not style) there will be one only.

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo._eventsByTime
member.summary: All the pattern midi events, key is when to play (scaled time).

member.name: F:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo._channelPatches
member.summary: Collection of all channels in this pattern. Key is number, value is associated patch.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.PatternName
member.summary: Pattern name. Empty indicates single pattern aka plain midi file.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.Tempo
member.summary: Tempo, if supplied by file. Default indicates invalid which will be filled in during read.

member.name: P:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.TimeSignature
member.summary: Time signature, if supplied by file.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor. Use only for initialization!

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.AddEvent(Ephemera.MidiLibEx.MidiEventDesc)
member.summary: Add an event to the collection. This function does the scaling.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.GetFilteredEvents(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Get enumerator for events using supplied filters.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.GetEventsWhen(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get all events at a specific scaled time.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.GetChannels(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get an ordered list of channels and their patches.

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.GetPatch(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the patch associated with the channel.
member.returns: The patch or -1 if invalid channel

member.name: M:Ephemera.MidiLibEx.PatternInfo.RemoveChannel(System.Int32)
member.summary: Remove a channel from the channel/patches collection.
